wikipedia_page.main: Richard "Dickie" Rooks (born 29 May 1940) is a former English footballer who played as a centre half. He made over 260 Football League appearances in the years after the Second World War.

response: After a 4th-place finish in 1962–63, the only way for Boro was down. They finished 10th, 17th, then 21st. On the last day of the season, Middlesbrough needed a draw at Cardiff to stay up, who themselves needed a win to remain in the division. A hat-trick from makeshift striker Dickie Rooks couldn't help Boro, who went down 5–3, and were relegated to the Third Division for the first time.
